channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Far East Russia’s Kuril Islands Run Out of Gas
item.description: Authorities on the isolated island chain near Japan had earlier imposed a 10-liter gasoline limit per customer.

item.title: Russia Bans Educational Nonprofit International Baccalaureate
item.description: The Prosecutor General’s Office accused IBO of “distorting well-known facts, spreading anti-Russian propaganda and fomenting interethnic discord.”

item.title: How Would Russia Treat a Ukraine Peace Deal? Chechnya and Georgia Offer Clues.
item.description: From Chechnya to Georgia, Russia has a pattern of circumventing or outright violating the terms of its agreements.

item.title: Primer ministro francés pedirá voto de confianza en Asamblea Nacional
item.description: París, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) El primer ministro francés, François Bayrou, anunció hoy que el 8 de septiembre solicitará el voto de confianza de la Asamblea Nacional, en una arriesgada jugada de todo o nada ante el rechazo a su presupuesto 2026. The post Prime

item.title: Vapeo, puerta de acceso al tabaquismo, asma y uso de sustancias
item.description: Londres, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) Un estudio realizado por científicos de Reino Unido mostró que el vapeo parece actuar como puerta de entrada al tabaquismo entre los jóvenes, y se vincula con mayor riesgo de asma y uso de sustancias. The post Vapeo, puerta de a

item.title: Guatemala: Denuncian retraso de audiencias contra exlíderes indígenas
item.description: Ciudad de Guatemala, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) Diversas organizaciones denunciaron hoy en Guatemala el retraso de las audiencias contra los exlíderes indígenas de los 48 Cantones del departamento de Totonicapán Luis Pacheco y Héctor Chaclán, encarcelados hace cua

item.title: French wine exporters 'hugely disappointed' over US tariff exemption failure
item.description: (KPL/AFP) The French wine exporters federation said Thursday it was "hugely disappointed" by the European Union's admission that it failed to secure a tariff exemption for the sector in the US-EU trade deal.
